JP, KSL, calm down. I talked it all out with Robert a long time ago, 
and he perfectly understands the rules. The one problem here is that 
Kinger has Galvatron, who is Megatron in a way.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: He was going to be in a predacon body. I havent broken any 
rules yet,
> and dont intend to. Why do you have to be so rude without even 
knowing
> what's happening. Holy
